guillotine verb [T]
(KILL)
to cut someone's head off using a guillotine: During the French Revolution, thousands of people were guillotined.

guillotine verb [T]
(LIMIT)
politics
  UK specialized to set a fixed time before a final vote must be taken on a particular law in Parliament: The bill was guillotined at the committee stage.
